#summary Stuff that we need

= Gearman =

Start gearman workers with the following command:

{{{
$ nohup php jakob-worker.php &
}}}

== Installation ==
See http://www.gearman.org and http://toys.lerdorf.com/archives/51-Playing-with-Gearman.html and https://launchpad.net/~gearman-developers/+archive/ppa

{{{
$ apt-get install gearman gearman-job-server gearman-tools libgearman4 libgearman-dev libdrizzle-dev
}}}

==Installing Gearman on Ubuntu 10.04==
First you need to include the PPA for the latest version of Gearman.

{{{
$ sudo apt-get install python-software-properties
}}}

{{{
$ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:gearman-developers/ppa
}}}

{{{
$ sudo apt-get update
}}}

{{{
$ apt-get install gearman gearman-job-server gearman-tools libgearman4 libgearman-dev
}}}

Now you can start the Gearman job server
{{{
$ gearmand -d
}}}
